draw() - Method in class main.DrawingSurface
Draws the DrawingSurface by illustrating the screen and needs to be currently displayed.
draw() - Method in class screen.EscapeScreen
 
draw() - Method in class screen.GameScreen
Draws the game screen by displaying the blueprint (walls and pillars), the obstacles of the game (including the monster), and generating the player
draw() - Method in class screen.Screen
Illustrates the screen to desired graphical properties of the game
draw() - Method in class screen.StartingScreen
Illustrates the Screen by setting the background to sky blue and noting that this is the starting screen.
draw(DrawingSurface) - Method in class sprites.Player
Draws the player on the screen.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class sprites.InvisCloak
Draws the InvisCloak to the screen.
DRAWING_HEIGHT - Variable in class screen.Screen
 
DRAWING_WIDTH - Variable in class screen.Screen
 
DrawingSurface - Class in main
This class represents the surface on which the screens and interactive sprites will be drawn.
DrawingSurface() - Constructor for class main.DrawingSurface
Constructs a DrawingSurface by creating the StartingScreen, GameScreen, and EscapeScreen for this game and stroing them in an ArrayList of Screens.
